class.name: DungeonCollectionCpp
class.brief_description: Resource that holds a collection of dungeon room PackedScenes.
class.description: DungeonCollectionCpp is a Resource-based class that manages a collection of PackedScene objects representing different dungeon rooms or corridors. It provides functionality to randomly select and instantiate rooms from the collection.

method.name: get_random_dungeon
method.description: Gets a random dungeon room from the collection. Randomly selects a PackedScene from the collection and instantiates it as a Dungeon2DCpp node. Returns [code]null[/code] if the collection is empty.

method.name: get_scenes
method.description: Gets a copy of the scenes array containing all PackedScene objects in the collection.

method.name: set_scenes
method.description: Sets the scenes array with a new array of PackedScene objects to store in the collection.

members.member: Array of PackedScene objects representing dungeon rooms or corridors.
